comments.body: Rather than test here you could add this to resttest as TestWatch and verify singular behavior.  Means you can add it to any supported storage.
Sorry--I don't follow--is there a fancy new testing package I'm not aware of?

Yeah, for testing that storage objects respect the rest conventions.  It's a bit higher level than this, but see pkg/api/rest/resttest.  

> On Apr 2, 2015, at 4:36 PM, Daniel Smith notifications@github.com wrote:

> In pkg/registry/minion/rest_test.go:

> >   +)

> >   +func TestMatchNode(t *testing.T) {
> >   Sorry--I don't follow--is there a fancy new testing package I'm not aware of?

OK I will give that a shot, that looks like a useful thing.
